alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton County through 315 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Durant Campground, or 9 miles northwest of Indian Lake, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Indian Lake, Blue Mountain Lake, Forked Lake Public Campground, Lake Eaton Campground, Lake Durant Campground, Golden Beach Campground, Long Lake, Eagle Nest, Catlin Lake and Deerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
